item.description:
Our next meeting is on Tuesday, January 26 at 7 PM probably at the Lounge in the SENIOR CENTER on 49 Pleasant Street off READING SQUARE. I will send another e-mail when the meeting place is confirmed.

I will be talking again this meeting about the recent finding of a viral connection to CFS (and probably FMS too) that has been in the news the last month. The group last month was quite small so I think repeating the information is important.

E-mail me if you want to present any findings or interesting information at the meeting.

See you in January.
Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia January Meetup
